name: iOS 15 UI Kit for Figma
description:
REQUIREMENTS

  • San Francisco Pro font installed (and enabled in Figma) https://developer.apple.com/fonts/


Community iOS 15 UI Kit for Figma

  • Styles
  • UI Components
  • Templates


Updates:

Feb 2, 2022

  • Tab Bar component added
  • Updated white background color on components
  • Updated location for search bar component


Jan 29, 2022

  • Added Search Bars
  • Added Status Bar
  • Improved Devices component
  • Improved typography color


Dec 15, 2021

  • Device notch and spacing improved
  • iPhone 13 Pro Max template
  • Navigation Bar
  • More system icons


Dec14, 2021

  • Activity Indicator with motion
  • Wheel Picker
  • Motion for Buttons
  • Motion for Slider
  • Motion for Stepper (click)
  • Percentage variants for progress and slider
  • Page control component added
